Crown Perth, formerly known as Burswood, is a renowned casino and entertainment complex located in Burswood, Western Australia. It is the only establishment in Western Australia where electronic gaming machines, commonly known as pokies, are legally permitted. The complex offers a wide range of gaming and entertainment facilities, making it a prominent destination for both locals and tourists.

== Location and Facilities ==
Crown Perth is situated on the banks of the Swan River, approximately 3.5 kilometers from the Perth central business district. The complex includes a casino, hotels, restaurants, bars, a convention centre, and a theatre. The casino is a significant part of the Crown Perth complex, providing a variety of gaming options and entertainment experiences.

== Gaming Offerings ==
Crown Perth offers a diverse range of gaming options, including table games, electronic gaming machines, and poker. As the only legal venue for pokies in Western Australia, it features a selection of these machines alongside traditional casino games such as blackjack, roulette, and baccarat.
